item.description:
I love Denzel and there was no way I wasn't going to put this one on the calendar!  

Showtime is at 7:10.  I will be at the movie theater by 6:15 and we will head in for seats by 6:45.      

The movie is showing upstairs so look for the group at the tables by the big windows at the top of the escalator.   I will be sporting my oh so stylish meetup pin and we will be the biggest group there.  :)

This is a Denzel film and I have seen lots of adds for it.  I strongly suggest that you buy your tickets ahead of time. 

If you miss the group ahead of time, come find us after.  We gather in the hallway outside of the theater we just saw the movie in, to discuss the film a bit, allow for restroom breaks and to get a head count of all those who would like to go out after for drinks and munchies.

$$$$Managing the after event is much easier if everyone brings cash, so please plan ahead if you want to go out with the group after.$$$$$

As always, please keep your rsvps up to date.  Thanks.

Movie Details:

Release Date: November 2, 2012
Studio: Paramount Pictures
Director: Robert Zemeckis
Screenwriter: John Gatins
Starring: Denzel Washington, Kelly Reilly, Don Cheadle, Bruce Greenwood, Brian Geraghty, John Goodman, Tamara Tunie
Genre: Drama
MPAA Rating: Not Available
Official Website: Paramount.com/Flight 

Plot Summary: "Flight" tells the redemption story of "Whip" (Washington), a commercial airline pilot who pulls off a heroic feat of flying in a damaged plane, saving 98 lives on a flight carrying 106 people. While the world begs to embrace him as a true American Hero, the everyman struggles with this label as he is forced to hold up to the scrutiny of an investigation that brings into question his behavior the night before the doomed flight.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a meetup pin. If the movie is showing upstairs, I will grab a table by the windows at the top of the escalator. If the movie is showing downstairs, I will be near the ropes by the concession stand.
item.name: Flight (7:10PM Show)
